title: [Epidemiology] Trump’s tweets may have affected US beliefs about the pandemic’s severity. Prior to his infection ~20% of tweets showed a belief that COVID-19 was a hoax, but this dropped to 3% after Trump tweeted about his infection. This reversed back to 10% after he tweeted, “Don’t be afraid of COVID-19”.
[Medicine] Rutgers Researcher Invents Microbiota Formula to Help High Risk Patients Fight COVID-19
